TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit EAAccessoryDelegate_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Disconnected (this MonoTouch.ExternalAccessory.IEAAccessoryDelegate This, MonoTouch.ExternalAccessory.EAAccessory accessory);
.method public static hidebysig void Disconnected(class MonoTouch.ExternalAccessory.IEAAccessoryDelegate This, class MonoTouch.ExternalAccessory.EAAccessory accessory) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance on which this extension method operates on.
